reviewText:
Everything is well executed in this lush production.  The voice over makes its intelligent design arguments clear for those paying close attention.

The underwater camera work in Bermuda and footage in Africa is all stunning.

Part 1 contains segments titled Symbiosis (how sea life both relies on and maintains coral reef and vice versa), Changes, Movement and Destiny. Part 2 segments are Species, Adaptations, Irreducibility and Eternity.

The tone is both tasteful and bold. Very, very entertaining!!
